place: 2 Square Robiac, 192 rue de Grenelle VII, Paris
author: James Joyce
text: Dear Mr Palmer: Will you please send six of your settings of Chamber Music for middle voice, say, up to A flat or G natural to M. Slivinsky, Au Sacre du Printemps, 3 rue Cherche-Midi, Paris, VII. I think I can arrange with him to bring them out for you in a satisfactory way and they would have a good sale here, I am sure. Have you set any of Pomes Penyeach? Sincerely yours James Joyce
